title: Ian THNG | Web Directory | Singapore Institute of Technology
text_lines: This question is for testing whether or not you are a human visitor and to prevent automated spam submissions.
Programme Director, TUM BSc Electrical Engineering & Information Technology
PhD Electronics Engineering, Curtin University of Technology, Australia
Programme Director, TUM BSc Electrical Engineering & Information Technology

Commonwealth Government of Australia APRA (Australian Post-Graduate Award), PhD in Robust and Optimal Signal Processing (Awarded by University of Western Australia, transferred to Curtin University later)
Member, Institute of Electrical and Electronic Engineers
